General.Name: Austin Gold Corp
General.Description: Austin Gold Corp., a gold exploration company, focuses on the acquisition, exploration, and evaluation of mineral resource properties in Nevada. It holds interest in the Kelly Creek Project located in the Kelly Creek Basin, Humboldt County, Nevada; and the Lone Mountain Project consisting of various unpatented lode mining and patented mining claims situated near Lone Mountain in Elko County. The company also has interest in the Stockade Mountain Project comprising various unpatented lode mining claims located in Malheur County, Oregon. Austin Gold Corp. was incorporated in 2020 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1021 West Hastings Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 0C3
